title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Natural
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Natural 
Mineral Waters, Spring Waters and Other Waters in Bottles or Containers) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the Regulations of 2020 and these 
Regulations may be cited together as the European Union (Natural Mineral 
Waters, Spring Waters and Other Waters in Bottles or Containers) Regulations 
2016 to 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (natural mineral water spring water water bottle containers) (amendment) regulation 2022 (2) principal regulation regulation 2020 regulation may cited together european union (natural mineral water spring water water bottle containers) regulation 2016 2022

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 13 January 2023.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 13 January 2023.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Union (Natural Mineral Waters, 
Spring Waters and Other Waters in Bottles or Containers) Regulations 2016 
(S.I. No. 282 of 2016); 

“Regulations of 2020” means the European Union (Natural Mineral Waters, 
Spring Waters and Other Waters in Bottles or Containers) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 55 of 2020).

heading: 5. Regulation 14 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting
text_raw:
5. Regulation 14 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting 

for paragraph (3) the following: 

“(3) The requirements applicable to other waters in Regulation 16, 
with the exception of those under Part A of Annex I to Directive 
2020/2184, shall also be applicable to spring waters.”.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 24.5.2017, p. 40).
text_raw:
24.5.2017, p. 40). 

 
 
 
 
 4 [691] 

“(3) In taking measures to apply the provisions of this Part, a 
person engaged in the production, processing or distribution of 
bottled waters, or the Authority, or an official agency, shall 
adopt the precautionary principle and shall not allow, whether 
directly or indirectly— 

(a) any deterioration of the present quality of water intended 

for human consumption, or 

(b) any increase in the pollution of waters used for the 
production of water intended for human consumption.”.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 35. Notwithstanding Regulations 14(3) and 16(1)(b), until 11 January
text_raw:
35. Notwithstanding Regulations 14(3) and 16(1)(b), until 11 January 
2026 a person may place on the market spring waters or other waters 
which do not comply with the parametric values set down in Part B of 
Annex I to Directive 2020/2184 for Bisphenol A, Chlorate, Chlorite, 
Haloacetic Acids, Microcystin-LR, PFAS Total, Sum of PFAS or 
Uranium.”.
text_norm: 35 notwithstanding regulation 14(3) 16(1)(b) 11 january 2026 person may place market spring water water comply parametric value set part b annex directive 2020 2184 bisphenol chlorate chlorite haloacetic acid microcystin-lr pfas total sum pfas uranium

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 14. References in other enactments to Council Directive 98/83/EC of 3
text_raw:
14. References in other enactments to Council Directive 98/83/EC of 3 
November 19989 shall be construed as references to Directive (EU) 2020/2184 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 December 20201. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 December, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

9 OJ No. L 330, 5.12.1998, p. 32. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [691]

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations give further effect to Directive (EU) 2020/2184 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 16 December 2020 on the quality of 
water 
the 
intended for human consumption. The Regulations amend 
requirements for water intended for human consumption that is put into bottles 
or containers, other than natural mineral waters. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Natural Mineral Waters, Spring 
Waters and Other Waters in Bottles or Containers) Regulations 2016. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Natural Mineral 
in Bottles or Containers) 
Waters, Spring Waters and Other Waters 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [691] 7
